pr_title: chore: dont run proguard only publish lib rules

timeline.message:
fix: dont run proguard only publish lib rules

The current configuration is to run Proguard on the library, before
generating an artifact.

Instead, we will vend rules to a consumer, so that _they_ can run
Proguard.

This approach is more in line with the behavior of other Android
libraries.

timeline.bodyText: will this fix the issue where our private/protected items become public?
timeline.author: raphkim

replies.bodyText: Since Proguard won’t be run, field visibility won’t be modified, true. I think this change will also fix our stack traces and “step-in” capability when debugging from a consuming application.
replies.author: jamesonwilliams
